google.title: Dutch flashcards
google.description: How to study effectively? Want to master Dutch vocabulary? Dutch Vocabulary flashcards are images/text/sound on cards, used to help remember new vocabulary in Dutch. Instead of simply reading the definition in a dictionary, the brain is also challenged via our several learning modes: Listen & Repeat, Study, Slide show, Matching, Memorize, Quiz to make the learning Dutch language more exciting and fun. ♥ ♥ GREAT CONTENT ♥ ♥ Dutch Vocabulary Conversation app includes 100+ Dutch conversations which cover the most used Dutch conversations from 9 categories: •Greetings •Food and drink •Daily Activities •Travel •Family •Hobbies •Shopping •Work •Society Dutch Vocabulary flashcards app includes 4000+ premade Dutch flashcards which cover the most used Dutch words from 9 categories: •Calendar •Description •Hobbies •Food and Meals •Human •Nature •Objects •Society •Travel Keys features: • Listen and repeat conversation to improve speaking skills • Daily test to master your vocabulary • Track study progress using Leitner system. • Enhance study using quiz, listening, matching games • Review schedule to help you review flashcards before they are expired. • Text to speech to study flashcards without looking at screens. • Download unlimited flashcards to your devices for offline study • Create your own flashcards to study your own materials. • Flashcards can be created on our website www.iaceatest.com

reviews.review: Hij is een goed app om beter teleren.
